sentences.text: I need to go to the bank to deposit my paycheck.
The bank approved my mortgage application last week.
She works as a teller at the bank downtown.
The bank charges high fees for international transfers.
I checked my bank balance online this morning.
The bank was robbed yesterday afternoon.
He opened a savings account at the bank.
The bank offers competitive interest rates.
My bank sent me a new debit card.
The bank closes at five on weekdays.
She got a loan from the bank to buy a car.
The bank froze his account due to suspicious activity.
I switched to an online bank last year.
The bank is located on the corner of Main Street.
He withdrew cash from the bank before the trip.
We sat on the bank and watched the river flow by.
The children played on the grassy bank of the stream.
Willow trees lined the bank of the pond.
He cast his fishing line from the bank.
The boat was tied to a post on the bank.
Erosion had worn away the bank over the years.
Frogs were croaking along the muddy bank.
She slipped on the steep bank and fell into the water.
Flowers bloomed along the sunny bank of the creek.
The deer came down to the bank to drink.
We had a picnic on the bank overlooking the lake.
The flood waters overflowed the bank.
Reeds grew thick along the bank of the marsh.
He walked along the bank looking for a shallow crossing.
The heron stood motionless on the bank.
A bat flew out of the cave at dusk.
Bats use echolocation to navigate in the dark.
The bat hung upside down from the tree branch.
We saw a colony of bats in the abandoned mine.
The bat spread its wings and took flight.
Fruit bats are important pollinators in tropical forests.
A bat got into our attic last summer.
The vampire bat feeds on blood from other animals.
Bats are the only mammals capable of true flight.
The bat swooped down to catch insects.
Baby bats cling to their mothers for several weeks.
The bat emerged from its roost at nightfall.
Some species of bat hibernate during winter.
The bat darted through the night sky hunting moths.
Researchers tagged the bat to track its migration.
He swung the bat and hit a home run.
She bought a new wooden bat for the season.
The bat cracked when it hit the fastball.
He gripped the bat tightly and waited for the pitch.
The bat was made of aluminum for durability.
She rested the bat on her shoulder between pitches.
The coach handed him a heavier bat to practice with.
He signed the bat and gave it to the young fan.
The bat slipped from his hands during the swing.
She chose a bat with a thicker handle.
The sound of bat hitting ball echoed across the field.
Players lined up their bats in the dugout.
He practiced his swing with a weighted bat.
The bat was autographed by the entire team.
She pointed her bat toward center field before the pitch.
A crane stood in the shallow water hunting for fish.
The crane spread its enormous wings and took off.
We spotted a sandhill crane in the wetlands.
The crane waded slowly through the marsh.
Cranes migrate thousands of miles each year.
The crane caught a frog in its long beak.
A pair of cranes were nesting near the pond.
The crane's call echoed across the lake.
Japanese art often depicts the crane as a symbol of longevity.
The crane preened its gray feathers by the water.
We watched the crane dance during mating season.
The whooping crane is an endangered species.
A crane landed gracefully in the rice paddy.
The crane stood on one leg in the shallows.
Flocks of cranes filled the sky at dawn.
The crane lifted the steel beam to the top floor.
A massive crane towered over the construction site.
The crane operator carefully lowered the container.
They brought in a crane to remove the fallen tree.
The crane swung the load over to the truck.
A tower crane was assembled for the skyscraper project.
The crane's cable snapped under the heavy weight.
Workers guided the crane as it positioned the air conditioner.
The crane hoisted the boat out of the water.
A mobile crane arrived to help with the bridge repair.
The crane extended its arm over the building.
Safety inspectors checked the crane before the lift.
The crane slowly raised the prefabricated wall into place.
Port cranes unloaded cargo from the ship.
The crane rotated to position the generator.
The cell divided into two daughter cells.
Red blood cells carry oxygen throughout the body.
She examined the cell under the microscope.
Cancer occurs when cells grow uncontrollably.
The cell membrane controls what enters and exits.
Nerve cells transmit electrical signals.
The cell contains DNA in its nucleus.
Stem cells can differentiate into many cell types.
Bacteria are single-celled organisms.
The cell produces energy through respiration.
White blood cells fight infection in the body.
The cell was stained to make the organelles visible.
Plant cells have rigid cell walls.
The researcher cultured cells in a petri dish.
Mitochondria are the powerhouses of the cell.
The prisoner sat alone in his cell.
The cell was small with only a bed and toilet.
Guards checked each cell during the night.
He spent ten years in a prison cell.
The cell door slammed shut behind him.
She was held in a cell awaiting trial.
The cell had a tiny window near the ceiling.
Inmates are confined to their cells at night.
The cell was cold and damp.
He paced back and forth in his narrow cell.
The cell block housed fifty prisoners.
She scratched marks on her cell wall to count the days.
The cell was searched for contraband.
He shared a cell with two other inmates.
The cell was unlocked at six every morning.
I left my cell at home and missed all your calls.
Her cell rang during the meeting.
He checked his cell for new messages.
My cell battery died halfway through the day.
She dropped her cell and cracked the screen.
I got a new cell for my birthday.
His cell buzzed with an incoming text.
Please silence your cell during the movie.
I saved the number in my cell.
Her cell was stolen from her purse.
He spoke into his cell while walking down the street.
My cell doesn't get reception out here.
She upgraded to a newer cell last month.
I need to charge my cell before we leave.
His cell kept autocorrecting his texts.
The flowers bloom in spring.
Spring arrived early this year with warm temperatures.
We're planning a vacation for spring break.
Birds return from migration in the spring.
Spring is my favorite time of year.
The trees started budding in late spring.
Spring cleaning is a yearly tradition.
Allergies are terrible during spring.
The days grow longer in spring.
Farmers plant their crops in spring.
Spring weather can be unpredictable.
The spring semester begins in January.
Lambs are born in the spring.
Spring showers bring May flowers.
We moved to our new house last spring.
The spring in the mattress was broken.
He replaced the spring in the old clock.
The spring compressed when she sat down.
A coiled spring stores mechanical energy.
The spring bounced back to its original shape.
The toy had a spring mechanism inside.
He stretched the spring too far and it lost tension.
The spring snapped and the lid flew open.
Car suspensions use springs to absorb bumps.
The spring provides resistance in the exercise machine.
She wound the spring tightly to power the music box.
The door closes automatically thanks to a spring.
The pen uses a spring to retract the tip.
A broken spring was causing the squeaking noise.
The spring expanded when released.
Fresh water bubbled up from the spring.
The village got its water from a natural spring.
We filled our bottles at the mountain spring.
The spring fed into a small stream.
Hot springs are popular tourist destinations.
The spring never dried up, even in summer.
Mineral springs were believed to have healing properties.
The spring emerged from a crack in the rocks.
Deer gathered at the spring to drink.
The spring water was cold and refreshing.
An underground spring supplied the well.
The spring had been used for centuries.
We discovered a hidden spring while hiking.
The spring flowed year-round without freezing.
Bottled spring water comes from natural sources.
He struck a match to light the candle.
The match flickered and went out in the wind.
She lit the campfire with a single match.
Keep matches away from children.
The match burned down to his fingers.
He pulled a match from the matchbox.
The wet match wouldn't ignite.
She used a match to light the gas stove.
The match hissed as it caught fire.
Safety matches only light on the box.
He tossed the spent match into the ashtray.
A single match can start a forest fire.
She kept matches in the emergency kit.
The match provided just enough light to see.
Wooden matches burn longer than paper ones.
The tennis match lasted three hours.
Our team won the match by two goals.
The boxing match was broadcast worldwide.
She prepared for months for the chess match.
The match ended in a draw.
Fans packed the stadium for the match.
The wrestling match was intense from start to finish.
He won every match in the tournament.
The match was postponed due to rain.
She lost the match in the final round.
The cricket match continued for five days.
It was an evenly contested match.
The match attracted millions of viewers.
He refereed the match between the two rivals.
The championship match is scheduled for Saturday.
These socks don't match each other.
The curtains match the carpet perfectly.
I need to find a tie that will match this shirt.
The DNA samples match the suspect.
Her story doesn't match his version of events.
The paint color didn't match what we expected.
Try to match the pieces of the puzzle.
His skills match the job requirements.
The fingerprints match those found at the scene.
I can't find shoes to match this dress.
The results match our predictions.
She tried to match his pace while running.
The two accounts don't match up.
We need to match supply with demand.
His actions don't match his words.
